083B42FA.Hardcore_BodyText: Your deeds of valor will be remembered.

20B14E2D.Hardcore_BodyTextLvl10Plus: Your deeds of valor will be remembered. {s1} has been moved to the Hall of Fallen Heroes.

41D171AB.Durability_Caution: {c_highlight}Your equipment is close to breaking{/c}. Visit a {icon:Marker_Blacksmith, 3} Blacksmith to repair.

45249CCE.Durability_Warning: You will lose {c_highlight}{s1} equipment durability{/c} when you revive at checkpoint

54C66A87.HeroNotHardcore: Only a Hardcore character can join a party of Hardcore heroes.

6D74C479.Durability_Broken: {c_red}Your equipment is fully broken{/c}. Visit a {icon:Marker_Blacksmith, 3} Blacksmith to repair.

7FA4C9A5.HeroDidCompletePrologue: Only a character that has not completed the prologue can join the party.

86C76D34.IGR_BodyText: You have been slain. Revive to continue your journey.

C1F17141.HeroNotSameWorldTier: Only a character in the same World Tier can join the party.

F4E18807.HeroDidntCompletePrologue: Only a character that has completed the prologue can join the party.
